name: Hook Grapplin' Tom
description:
Made in 2 weeks for Disc Room Game Jam with the themes discs and/or rooms.

Playtime: 15  - 30 minutes depending on how good you are.

Controls:

Mouse to click and drop everything

Source code: GitHub
